column5: Hit the Grand for some walleye action ... unfortunately they weren't home ... managed to hook into a beauty bow but she broke off after 5 or 6 giant leaps ... seen a lot of bows trying to make it up the dam ( or the same one that just couldn't do it)
good stuff.  We'll be out that way this week-end doing Christmas stuff.  Although fishing is a definite no-no, might be a good break to take the kids down there to see some fish jumping
